1.title: Bob and Vargas Meet
1.plot: When Bob wakes up from an afternoon snooze, his wife Samantha introduces him to her brother Vargas, who was just released from prison. When left alone, Vargas's intimidating side emerges toward Bob.

2.title: Bob and Vargas See a Friend
2.plot: Having realized that Vargas hasn't had the comfort of a woman for several years, Bob and Samantha arrange a date for Vargas in the hopes that there will be a romantic spark.

3.title: Bob and Vargas Go for a Hike
3.plot: Bob and Vargas head out to the hills for a relaxing time in nature. Vargas incessantly insults Bob to the point where he gets fed up. Frustrated by the constant name calling and bullying, Bob decides to play a prank on Vargas.

4.title: Bob and Vargas at a Job Interview
4.plot: Bob arranges for Vargas to have an interview with his boss. Once the interview begins to go poorly, Vargas loses his cool much to Bob's chagrin.

imdb.plot outline: A comedy series about straight-laced Bob and his hard-ass brother-in-law Vargas. Broke-ass Vargas gets an early release from the Big House and moves into Bob and Samantha's little-ass-LA-house. With Vargas offering no assistance with the mortgage payment, and sleeping on the couch, Bob can do nothing but help Vargas acclimate to "life on the outside", but Vargas has a hard time leaving his hardened ways behind. In the process, Vargas teaches Bob some lessons in gaining self-respect - prison style.
imdb.title: Bob and Vargas
plot: Foul-mouthed Vargas gets released from prison and moves in with Bob and Samantha. Bob is tasked with helping Vargas acclimate to "life on the outside", but Vargas has a difficult time leaving his hardened ways behind.

A comedy series about straight-laced Bob and his hard-ass brother-in-law Vargas. Broke-ass Vargas gets an early release from the Big House and moves into Bob and Samantha's little-ass-LA-house. With Vargas offering no assistance with the mortgage payment, and sleeping on the couch, Bob can do nothing but help Vargas acclimate to "life on the outside", but Vargas has a hard time leaving his hardened ways behind. In the process, Vargas teaches Bob some lessons in gaining self-respect - prison style.
